product_name: Swix Piper Low-Profile Tri-Pack Boot Pack
long_description: With boots in the outer compartments, there is plenty of room in this pack for a helmet, jacket, gloves, wax and other gear. Its low profile is sleek and keeps your load balanced and easy to carry.
short_description: With boots in the outer compartments, there is plenty of room in this pack for a helmet, jacket, gloves, wax and other gear. Its low profile is sleek and keeps your load balanced and easy to carry.
